onboarding.paragraph_step1: As a client, you can get help with countless tasks from skilled people near you
onboarding.paragraph_step2: Please indicate details such as the need for tools, the amount of people required, etc. to get help faster
onboarding.paragraph_step3: When using our app, you're already tapping into a network of trusted and skilled partners -help us keep it that way! Refrain from exchanging contact information externally

form.title_step1: What do you need help with?

offboarding.title_step1: Your service request is live on RingTwice!
offboarding.paragraph_step1: The best providers in your region will be automatically notified and you will receive various offers within 4 hours
offboarding.paragraph_step2: Compare prices and ratings, and click 'Accept'
offboarding.paragraph_step3: Once a you accept a provider's proposal, you'll be able to chat with them and agree on the details
